page.title: 12ELLEN SMITH'S COACHES
page.content: Ellen Smith coaches are used by a lot of people in our area.Heybrook School always use their coaches for school trips.They have taken children to Huddersfield,Fleetwood,Blackpool, Manchester,Bolton,St.Ann's and Hebden Bridge. Ellen Smith coaches is a busy place and the firm has been doing well since it started in 1900.Today (June,1985) they have 18 coaches and 15 full time drivers.Two fitters work in the garage maintaining and repairing the fleet of coaches. They have many different sized coaches used for short term and long term journeys.There are 41 seaters, 49 seaters, 51 seaters, 53 seaters and 57 seaters.The coaches travel as far as Germany and France.
